snippet: Commissioner Roger Goodell said the league was willing to help fund a new stadium to keep the Raiders in Oakland.
abstract: NFL Roundup; NFL commissioner Roger Goodell announces that the league is willing to contribute money to help build a stadium to keep Oakland Raiders in Oakland, Calif; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Roger Goodell said the league was willing to help fund a new stadium to keep the Raiders in Oakland.

headline.main: N.F.L. Offers Stadium Help for Oakland Raiders
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Offer Could Help Raiders Stay In Oakland
